name: Draw your Future
description:
You're trapped in a painting! Scratch your way through the levels to escape!

Dive in a new art-inspired 2D platformer and guide your character in the exploration of the levels, each one taking place in a different famous painting.

Scratch the background to reveal the author's sketches. You will find some curious tricks that will help you make your way to the exit.

But be careful! Not all that is hidden is friendly!

Draw your future is a 2D platformer game developed for the Video game Design and Programming course at the Politecnico di Milano.

More information at:

http://www.polimigamecollective.org
